message: I propose a 90/10 split. I think it's a fair start, and I'm confident we can come to a more equitable agreement in the next round if you're not satisfied.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but it wasn't quite fair. Let's be more realistic. I propose 70/30.  We both lose if this drags on.
I'm willing to compromise further, but 70/30 is still too lopsided. Let's meet in the middle at 55/45. If we don't find common ground soon, we'll both end up with less.
